pr_title: Add Docker-based tests for proxy connection mode

timeline.bodyText: We need to explicitly disable the build cache here since we aren't properly tracking the target server (docker image) as an input. It actually turns out we have the same issue with our Docker packaging tests for which I've addressed in #51717. You'll need to add a doNotCacheIf() condition here similar to this one so we don't accidentally skip these tests.
